posts.description:
We cannot believe today is the last day of the #MommyAndMini2017 challenge! Just because today is the official end, it doesn't mean to stop playing around with your kiddies! We would love for you to continue to make it a daily thing and continue to use this hashtag so we can check in with you! @minilaurasykora and I appreciate all of the love and support you've shown us... and for allowing us to guide you these past 10 days. We will announce the winners of the giveaways via my Instastory on Thursday in order for people to catch up! So without further ado, the last pose can be any malasana or toestand variation. üíï
.
Matching leggings are from our collection with @bodyangelactivewear! Use code "MommyAndMini" for 20% off if both mommy and mini leggings are purchased together. üíó

Today's pose for the #MommyAndMini2017 challenge is any Bird of Paradise or any Standing Balance Pose. Mini always puts me to shame with this one! üòù PS... I loathe this pose but it's J's favorite... so we had to do it!
.
Matching leggings are from our collection with @bodyangelactivewear! Use code "MommyAndMini" for 20% off if both mommy and mini leggings are purchased together. üíó

Today's pose for the #MommyAndMini2017 challenge is any variation of Wheel Pose or Bridge Pose. Swipe left to see where she started out from 3 years ago!
.
Matching leggings are from our collection with @bodyangelactivewear! Use code "MommyAndMini" for 20% off if both mommy and mini leggings are purchased together. üíó

Another breakthrough for @minilaurasykora! These pictures were taken 3 years apart.
.
Today's pose for the #MommyAndMini2017 challenge is any variation of Bow Pose. .
Matching leggings (in the 2017 pic) are from our collection with @bodyangelactivewear! Use code "MommyAndMini" for 20% off if both mommy and mini leggings are purchased together. üíó

I'm such a proud mama bear! Mini finally can get up into a headstand! .

.

Today's pose for the #MommyAndMini2017 challenge is Crow Pose (or any variation of Toestand)! This is mini's favorite arm balance! Make sure to check in with @minilaurasykora for the koalasana variation. üíó
.
Matching leggings are from our collection with @bodyangelactivewear! Use code "MommyAndMini" for 20% off if both mommy and mini leggings are purchased together. üíó

Less than 2 weeks until I head back to LAS VEGAS! I will be teaching 3 workshops at @truyogalv from May 5-7. ‚ù§ Click the link above for more info and to register! Make sure to tag anyone you know in the area who may be interested!
.
üîπFriday, May 5 from 6-8pm: FriYAY Flow, Crows & Handstands!
.
üîπ Saturday, May 6 from 10-12:30pm: Inversions 101: Building from the Ground Up!
.
üîπ Sunday, May 7 from 10-12pm: Funky, Funky, Funky!
.
www.laurasykora.com

Today's pose for the #MommyAndMini2017 challenge is any variation of Cobra Pose. We decided to throw in a fun acro variation since the mini is so bendy! Make sure to check in with @minilaurasykora for another fun variation. üíó
.
Matching leggings are from our collection with @bodyangelactivewear! Use code "MommyAndMini" for 20% off if both mommy and mini leggings are purchased together. üíó

Today's pose for the #MommyAndMini2017 challenge is any variation of Plank. Make sure to check in with @minilaurasykora for a bit of a throwback! üíó
.
Matching leggings are from our collection with @bodyangelactivewear! Use code "MommyAndMini" for 20% off if both mommy and mini leggings are purchased together. üíó

Where are all of my mama yogis at? Excited to announce that @minilaurasykora and I will be hosting the #MommyAndMini2017 Yoga Challenge from April 21-30.
.
Rules are simple... .
* Make sure to tag and follow @laurasykora, @minilaurasykora and our fabulous sponsor @bodyangelactivewear.  Make sure to use the #MommyAndMini2017 hashtag on each picture!
* Participate in all 10 days with your mini for a chance to win some matching leggings. .
* Have fun getting your family involved!
* Go watch and screenshot my Instastory now for the list of poses!
* Tag your friends in the comments below and get them to join in with their family!

Got a little bit creative today at the lake! First lesson learned? Close your eyes when throwing sand! üòú
.
Did you guys know that I shoot 95% of my pictures by myself? I don't even use a tripod... most of the times my camera is on the ground propped up on my phone or on my camera bag.  So fancy! üòÇ (If you're wondering, I mainly shoot with a Nikon D750 with an 85mm prime lens at 1.4/f. #TeamNikonForever)

One of my current work-in-progress poses... close grip handstand. Sometimes I can hold it, other times... not so much. üòù Today was a good day. .
.
Marina Long Top & Midnight Leggings by @bodyangelactivewear. Use code "LAURASYKORA" for 15% off.

Flashback to some fun in Las Vegas with my fave bboy @rockadeezy! Can't wait to play next month!!! And YES... I will be teaching while out there at @truyogalv! May 5-7. ‚ù§
Click the link above for more info and to register!
If you're going to do something... might as well do it in style! üòú

Something that doesn't bother me anymore? Getting dirty! üòù

#LightItUpBlue üíô This post is dedicated to my beautiful, perfect mini-man. He has the kindest, gentlest soul and the most infectious smile. I cannot wait to see the incredible man he will become. üíô
